definition: the blessing of three lifetimes (idiom)/(courteous language) it's my good fortune...
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Part 7. It was a great privilege to hear her sing .
sentences.chinese: 聽她唱歌真是三生有幸。

sentences.english: It is a privilege to be talking to you nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 當今能跟你談話真是我三生有幸。

sentences.english: It is a privilege to be speaking to you today.
sentences.chinese: 今天能跟你談話真是咱三生有幸。

sentences.english: To hold the hand, one hundred to mend altogether hoary head.
sentences.chinese: 三生有幸握素手，百年修得共白頭。

sentences.english: To love you for life, song weiyang.
sentences.chinese: 三生有幸愛上你，一生一世曲未央。

sentences.english: Any lady would be fortunate to be courted by you.
sentences.chinese: 讓你求婚的女士其實都三生有幸。

definition: I have been looking forward to meeting you for a long time (idiom)
Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling/see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]
your name has been known to me for a long time (polite)
honorific: I've long looked forward to meeting you./It's an honor to meet you at last.
we are honored by your presence

pinyin: ren2 sheng1 he2 chu4 bu4 xiang1 feng2

definition: It is a great honor to meet you.
